body_html:
I agree with you it is related, however I am not asking for the creation of a toolbox, more for a small example script somewhere, which let you use TensorBoard as it was planned !
But I would be in favour of such a tool of course if the team is motivated !

body:
I agree with you it is related, however I am not asking for the creation of a toolbox, more for a small example script somewhere, which let you use TensorBoard as it was planned !
But I would be in favour of such a tool of course if the team is motivated !
